CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 28, 1964, pg. 8, reads: "Model for Murphy's - These people, all decked out in their Easter finery, are modeling for the G. C. Murphy Co., in Homewood, which recently enlarged its lines of wearing apparel to tots, teens and misses. The styles are supplied from the firm's style center in New York City.  The models here, who are employes [sic], participated in Murphy's Easter Style Show, held recently.  left to right, front: Chucky Hartman, Cynthia Pressley, Kimmy Hartman, Sandy Hartman and Albert Price.  Second row: Shelley Lowry, Jo Ann Henderson, Martha Van Don Drees, Mrs. Lee and Bridgette Stefanowicz. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Cynthia Pressley and Kimmy Hartman, modeling clothing for G.C. Murphy Co., setting up Easter display with flowers and stuffed rabbits for Murphy's Easter Style Show, another version
